title: Option to log out/relog (to fix clientside issues)
body:
Title is relatively self explanatory, sometimes you have clientside issues so you tell your friend that you're queueing with (or if you aren't, you don't) that you're going to relog - which involved closing the client, opening it again, waiting for it to open etc etc.
**Point is the addition of a log out button would be welcome in just saving time. I don't see why it shouldn't be there.**

Not sure where this belonged so I posted it in GD and Misc.
